item: River basin environmental adaptive management plan
description: Develop a 1500-word adaptive management plan for the Okavango River Basin, including context, vision, goals, monitoring schedule, reporting, and outreach. Submitted within four weeks of course completion.
Practical test using photographs to assess identification skills learned during fauna and flora surveys in the Okavango River basin. Conducted towards the end of the field course.

item: Field surveys of river basin ecosystem indicator species
description: Contribute to field surveys by identifying and collecting data on species distribution. Assessed during survey work in the Okavango Delta with ongoing academic feedback.

item: Organisms, process, and people of the Okavango River basin
description: Research and present a 3-minute talk on ecological and social values of the Okavango River Basin at the beginning of the course.
